[[inst_hl_ldip]]
==== HL.LDIP

*Syntax:* hl.ldip [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldip.svg[HL.LDIP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PAIR
